Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

My first game written in Quest has been released.  It is an old school text adventure but you cannot die and the intention is that everything mentioned in the descriptions can be examined.  


http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/g2lj8okseeslx8z6cez3aa/lost-cavern


Any comments on the puzzles, level of difficulty or what you think of it would be appreciated.

Thanks

Simon
